mapper.select: select emp_num, emp_Kname, dept_position, dept_duty, department.dept_deptName, DATE_FORMAT(emp_joinDate, '%Y-%m-%d')as emp_joinDate, concat(substring(concat('0',emp_tel) from 1 for 3),'-',substring(concat('0',emp_tel) from 4 for 3),'-',substring(concat('0',emp_tel) from 7 for 4)) as emp_tel, emp_email from employee join department on dept_num = dept_deptNum order by emp_joinDate desc
